description: A billing information to set up a new billing account.
title: billingInformation

$eref.description: A structured textual way of describing how to find an address, using unformatted strings for the street address.
$eref.title: formattedAddress

___addressLine2.description: A formatted address line that contains a non-fielded street address, sub-address (e.g. Suite number), etc.

___addressLine1.description: A formatted address line that contains a non-fielded street address.

___locality.description: A bounded locality within a city, town or shire principally of urban character.

___postcode.description: A descriptor for a postal delivery area, used to speed and simplify the delivery of mail.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, formattedAddress.

___country.description: The country that the address is in.

___stateOrProvince.description: The state or province that the address is in.

___postcodeExtension.description: The four-digit extension on an American postal code, what comes after the hyphen when specified.

___city.description: City that the address is in.

$eref.description: A full representation of an address, as well as geocoding reference for the property.
$eref.title: fieldedAddress

___streetNr.description: Number identifying a specific property on a public street. It may be combined with streetNrLast for ranged addresses.

___postcode.description: A descriptor for a postal delivery area, used to speed and simplify the delivery of mail.

___subUnitNr.description: The discriminator used for the subunit, often just a sumple number but may also be a range.

___privateStreetName.description: Private streets internal to a property (e.g., a university) with an internal name not recorded by the land title office.

___streetName.description: The name of the street or other street type.

___levelType.description: Describes level types within a building (e.g., Floor).

___postcodeExtension.description: The four-digit extension on an American postal code, what comes after the hyphen when specified.

___locality.description: A bounded locality within a city, town or shire principally of urban character.

___streetType.description: The type of street (e.g., Street, St., Road, Rd., Alley).

___streetNrLast.description: Last number in a range of street numbers allocated to an address.

___buildingName.description: Allows for buildings with well-known names to be used in an address.

___levelNr.description: Used where a level type may be repeated (e.g., BASEMENT 1, BASEMENT 2).

___objectType.description: The type of the object, fieldedAddress.

___streetNrSuffix.description: The suffix of the first street number (in a street number range) or the suffix for the street number if there is no range.

___country.description: The country that the address is in.

___streetSuffix.description: A modifier denoting a relative direction.

___stateOrProvince.description: The state or province that the address is in.

___subUnitType.description: The type of subunit (e.g., Flat, Suite, Tower, Unit).

___city.description: The city that the address is in.

$eref.description: This represents a reference to an address. The reference should be an address id from an address inventory, a geocoded reference from a geospatial system, etc.
$eref.title: addressReference

___objectType.description: The type of the object, addressReference.

___reference.description: The reference can be used to identify an address.

___billingAddress.description: Identifies a property address or postal delivery address. Used to establish a new billing account. Must be specified if existingBillingAccountNumber is not specified.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, billingInformation.

___existingBillingAccountNumber.description: Identifies an existing billing account to which the recurring and non-recurring charges for this request will be billed. Must be specified if billing contact and billing address are not specified

___name.description: Identifies the name of the person or office.

___telephoneNumber.description: Identifies the telephone number (excluding extension) of the Contact.

___email.description: Identifies the electronic mail address of the Contact.

___telephoneNumberExt.description: Identifies the telephone number extension of the Contact.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, contact.

___billingContact.description: Identifies the information of the person or office to be contacted on billing matters. Used to establish a new billing account. Must be specified if existingBillingAccountNumber is not specified.
